_help:
Each object in providers describes how a single external service is authenticated.

Required keys:
  name   – logical identifier used by providers (lowercase, snake_case)
  vault  – 1Password vault name where secrets live
  item   – item title inside that vault (or document title for files)
  auth   – object with method-specific requirements

Supported auth.method values:
  api_token           – single static token field
  oauth2_client       – client_id + client_secret (and usually redirect_uri)
  oauth2_client_file  – full JSON file stored as an OP document
  service_keys        – e.g. Supabase anon / service keys
  basic_auth          – username + password

Add new patterns as needed.
